input_args.passage: 'Shashi Kapoor/Daughter | Sanjana Kapoor, Sanjana Kapoor (born 27 November 1967) is an Indian theatre personality and former film actress. She is the daughter of actors Shashi Kapoor and Jennifer Kapoor.'
